title: D-Link WiFi range extender vulnerable to command injection attacks
description: The popular D-Link DAP-X1860 WiFi 6 range extender is susceptible to a vulnerability allowing DoS (denial of service) attacks and remote command injection. [...]

title: ALPHV ransomware gang claims attack on Florida circuit court
description: The ALPHV (BlackCat) ransomware gang has claimed an attack that affected state courts across Northwest Florida (part of the First Judicial Circuit) last week. [...]

title: GNOME Linux systems exposed to RCE attacks via file downloads
description: A memory corruption vulnerability in the open-source libcue library can let attackers execute arbitrary code on GNOME Linux systems. [...]

title: Over 17,000 WordPress sites hacked in Balada Injector attacks last month
description: Multiple Balada Injector campaigns have compromised and infected over 17,000 WordPress sites using known flaws in premium theme plugins. [...]

title: Hackers modify online stores’ 404 pages to steal credit cards
description: A new Magecart card skimming campaign hijacks the 404 error pages of online retailer's websites, hiding malicious code to steal customers' credit card information. [...]

title: Hackers hijack Citrix NetScaler login pages to steal credentials
description: Hackers are conducting a large-scale campaign to exploit the recent CVE-2023-3519 flaw in Citrix NetScaler Gateways to steal user credentials. [...]

title: HelloKitty ransomware source code leaked on hacking forum
description: A threat actor has leaked the complete source code for the first version of the HelloKitty ransomware on a Russian-speaking hacking forum, claiming to be developing a new, more powerful encryptor. [...]
